mapper.select: select la.id, la.lease_start_date, la.lease_end_date, la.status, la.rent, la.deposit, ai.name as apartment_name, ri.room_number, gi.name, gi.url from lease_agreement la left join apartment_info ai on la.apartment_id = ai.id and ai.is_deleted = 0 left join room_info ri on la.room_id = ri.id and ri.is_deleted = 0 left join graph_info gi on ai.id = gi.item_id and gi.item_type = 1 and gi.is_deleted = 0 where la.is_deleted = 0 and la.user_id = #{userId} order by la.create_time desc
